dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for the device which provides this AE

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: Unique AE title for this Network AE

dcmOtherAETitle.title: Other AE Title
dcmOtherAETitle.description: Additional AE Title of Network AE - will also accept Association RQs with such Called AE Title

hl7ApplicationName.title: HL7 Application name
hl7ApplicationName.description: HL7 Application and Facility name (Application|Facility) associated with this AE

dicomDescription.title: AE Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the AE

dicomAssociationInitiator.title: Association Initiator
dicomAssociationInitiator.description: True if the Network AE can initiate associations, false otherwise

dicomAssociationAcceptor.title: Association Acceptor
dicomAssociationAcceptor.description: True if the Network AE can accept associations, false otherwise

dicomApplicationCluster.title: Application Cluster
dicomApplicationCluster.description: Locally defined names for a subset of related applications

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the AE is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the AE is inherited from the device

dicomHostname.title: Hostname
dicomHostname.description: DNS name for this particular connection

dicomPort.title: Port
dicomPort.description: TCP/UDP port that a service is listening on. May be missing if this network connection is only used for outbound connections

dicomTLSCipherSuite.title: TLS CipherSuites
dicomTLSCipherSuite.description: The TLS CipherSuites that are supported on this particular connection. If not present TLS is disabled

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Network Connection is installed on the network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Network Connection is inherited from the device
